segments.text: I'm really fixated on that stool the boy is standing on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's positioned so awkwardly, with its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can clearly see it's tilted, just on the verge of toppling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can no one be paying attention to this very obvious danger?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel quite angry that the adult isn't aware of the risk to these children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, his whole body reaching for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost painful to watch, anticipating a fall at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's presence nearby only adds to the potential for a double mishap.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm afraid they could both get hurt if that stool goes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel a bit sad to imagine such a preventable accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a recipe for disaster if something isn't done soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could reach in and stabilize the stool myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for injury here is just too high.
segments.speaker: PAR
